author: The Film Theorists
description:
Thanks to Opera for sponsoring this episode! Download to be a part of the future of browsing here ► https://opr.as/Opera-browser-filmtheory 

*🎮❤️ Subscribe to gain another life!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

I FINALLY watched Emesis Blue after a ton of recommendations and well…this is a weird one. This is one of the best written, most engaging mysteries I’ve ever seen on YouTube. It’s an entire movie made by a channel called Fortress Films, released right here for free on YouTube. What might seem on the surface like a terrifying horror fan film is actually a deep, introspective look at what it means to be alive… and whether you might be better off dead.
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Film Theory: Emesis Blue is More Disturbing Than You Think...
